raw_body: “The family announce the sad passing of MRS CYNTHIA SILVA, beloved wife of late Frank Silva, beloved mother of Telesphore (Retired) of Emirates Airlines, Dubai, Christopher Ajantha, (Retired, Blands Shipyards, Gibraltar) and Shamal, (New Zealand).......... beloved motherin- law of Mala, Damayanthi and Shirani, and sister of late Melroy, late Myrna, and Carmen, and Maureen.
